description: The Dataset Usage Vocabulary (DUV) is used to describe consumer experiences, citations, and feedback about datasets from the human perspective.
label: Dataset Usage Vocabulary

RatingFeedback.description: Predefined criteria used to express a user opinion about a dataset or distribution using a discrete range of values.
RatingFeedback.label: Rating Feedback

UserFeedback.description: User feedback on the dataset. Expresses whether the dataset was useful or not, for example.
UserFeedback.label: User Feedback

Usage.description: A helpful description of actions that can be performed on a given dataset or distribution.
Usage.label: Usage

UsageTool.description: A synopsis describing the way a tool can use a dataset or distribution.
UsageTool.label: UsageTool

hasDistributor.description: The distributor is the organization that makes the dataset available for downloading and use.
hasDistributor.label: has distributor

hasFeedback.description: User feedback associated with Dataset or distribution
hasFeedback.label: has dataset feedback

hasUsageTool.description: Describes the tool that provides the Usage
hasUsageTool.label: has usage tool
